text: Mastet vhɨk, ana harigi mpamparir vhɨgi fara muuŋgiap kɨvgi fhuvara. Ana guigira bisaŋgi. Ana zumgum vhuuv, guigira kɨvgiap, ana mba mɨnan ki mpampari, ana za nta kambarigi. Ana kha vhuui vhuuŋ mbara muuŋgiap, guigira kɨvgiap ŋgagi bakɨvi shɨgim, korgi zav ana ŋgagi khoni ga mbuav anan ki.” Nza Zisas khothɨgi tɨv mastet vhɨga fara muuŋgi. (13.31)
